generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and cars driving on it.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible walking on a sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees are visible lining the street and in the background.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the sidewalk and between parked cars.
- sky: A small portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible, including one crossing the road and others walking on the sidewalk.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along the sides of the road and some are in motion.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a yield sign and a speed limit sign.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- truck: A truck is visible parked on the left side of the road.
